definition: banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: The show features a sports car with the Confederate battle flag painted on top.
sentences.chinese: 該劇以一臺噴塗了邦聯戰旗的跑車爲特色。

sentences.english: ZhanQi village is a new countryside affiliated to ChenDu city.
sentences.chinese: 戰旗村是成都市市級新農村。

sentences.english: Yes, I can see it now, rainbow battle flagswaving over field of battle.
sentences.chinese: 我現在可以想見彩虹戰旗在戰場上飄舞。

definition: magnificent army with thousands of men and horses (idiom); impressive display of manpower/all the King's horses and all the King's men
to charge and break through enemy lines
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
using the few to defeat the many (idiom); to win from a position of weakness
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
